name: h3
description: The 2026 Marucci CATX RCKLESS Hybrid Drop 8 USSSA Baseball Bat is a game-changer for serious players. With its slightly end-loaded swing feel and two-piece hybrid construction, this bat is designed to deliver power and precision. The ring-free barrel construction enhances barrel flex and overall bat production, while the AZR Alloy ensures optimal plate performance and responsiveness. Its multi-variable wall design expands the sweet spot, and the OLS connection offers the stiffest connection to reduce vibrations for smooth swings. Finished in a striking colorway of black, neon green, and sky blue, this bat not only performs exceptionally but also stands out on the field. Warranty chevron-down chevron-down chevron-down Warranty A Full Manufacturer's Warranty of 365 Days is included. If a warranty issue arises, our Bat Experts are happy to assist you in reaching the manufacturer to get a fast replacement! Begin Your Claim Here: Start My Warranty Claim
features: Delivery: Free & Fast Shipping on all orders
Warranty: Full twelve (12) months through the manufacturer
Colorway: Black, neon green, & sky blue
Ring-Free Barrel Construction: Enhances barrel flex & overall bat production
OLS Connection: Stiffest connection that reduces vibrations for smooth swings
AZR Alloy: Ensures optimal plate performance & bat responsiveness
Multi-Variable Wall Design: Expanded sweet spot w/ forgiving barrel walls
TFX End Cap: Softer end cap increases forgiveness
PFX Composite Handle: Engineered by bat drop enhancing speed, power, & feel
Custom Knob Design: Optimized knob shape for each drop for better feel
Enhanced Soft Touch Grip: Enhances feel & control
